data.lyric:
[ti:Getting Older]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Happier Than Ever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Getting Older - Billie Eilish
[00:03.79]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:07.59]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:11.39]I'm gettin' older I think I'm agin' well
[00:15.27]
[00:16.84]I wish someone had told me I'd be doin' this by myself
[00:21.81]
[00:22.72]There's reasons that I'm thankful there's a lot I'm grateful for
[00:27.23]
[00:28.43]But it's different when a stranger's always waitin' at your door
[00:33.63]
[00:35.37]Which is ironic 'cause the strangers seem to want me more
[00:40.43]Than anyone before
[00:42.98]Anyone before
[00:46.13]
[00:48.81]Too bad they're usually deranged
[00:51.54]
[00:54.30]Last week I realized I crave pity
[00:58.36]When I re-tell a story I make everything sound worse
[01:03.90]
[01:05.33]Can't shake the feeling that I'm just bad at healing
[01:10.39]And maybe that's the reason every sentence sounds rehearsed
[01:15.72]
[01:17.33]Which is ironic because when I wasn't honest
[01:21.91]I was still bein' ignored
[01:25.06]Lyin' for attention just to get neglection
[01:30.61]
[01:32.35]Now we're estranged
[01:34.08]
[01:37.81]Things I once enjoyed
[01:40.53]
[01:43.76]Just keep me employed now
[01:48.31]
[01:49.66]Things I'm longing for
[01:54.04]
[01:55.65]Someday I'll be bored of
[01:58.74]
[01:59.35]It's so weird
[02:09.66]
[02:10.66]That we care so much until we don't
[02:15.79]
[02:17.16]I'm gettin' older I've got more on my shoulders
[02:21.93]
[02:22.73]But I'm gettin' better at admitting when I'm wrong
[02:27.76]
[02:28.78]I'm happier than ever at least that's my endeavor
[02:34.48]To keep myself together and prioritize my pleasure
[02:39.94]
[02:41.28]'Cause to be honest I just wished the word I promised
[02:46.14]Would depend on what I'm givin'
[02:49.15]Not on his permission
[02:51.59]
[02:52.21]Wasn't my decision
[02:54.51]
[02:56.26]To be abused mm
[03:00.24]
[03:01.78]Things I once enjoyed
[03:04.60]
[03:07.50]Just keep me employed now
[03:11.18]
[03:13.68]Things I'm longing for mm
[03:18.69]
[03:19.66]Someday I'll be bored of
[03:22.42]
[03:23.15]It's so weird
[03:34.23]
[03:35.00]That we care so much until we don't
[03:39.86]
[03:41.75]But next week I hope I'm somewhere laughin'
[03:46.34]For anybody asking I promise I'll be fine
[03:51.76]
[03:53.32]I've had some trauma did things I didn't wanna
[03:58.28]Was too afraid to tell ya but now I think it's time
data.trans:
[ti:Getting Older]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Happier Than Ever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.79]//
[00:07.59]//
[00:11.39]我年岁渐长 我想我在变得更好
[00:15.27]
[00:16.84]真希望有人曾提前告诫我 我要独自面对这些风雨
[00:21.81]
[00:22.72]让我心怀感激的事情很多 我有许许多多的感谢要说
[00:27.23]
[00:28.43]但是当陌生人守在你家门口 这世界就不再那样友善
[00:33.63]
[00:35.37]真是讽刺 这些人明明与我初次谋面 却似乎
[00:40.43]比从前遇见的任何人都更想占有我
[00:42.98]比从前任何人都想
[00:46.13]
[00:48.81]糟糕至极 他们总是如同疯子一般
[00:51.54]
[00:54.30]上周 我猛然意识到 我渴望他人的同情
[00:58.36]一篇故事在我的复述中 听上去比事实更加糟糕
[01:03.90]
[01:05.33]无法摆脱这样的感觉 我没有能力自我疗愈
[01:10.39]或许这就是为什么 我的每句话听起来都似有过预先排演
[01:15.72]
[01:17.33]讽刺的是 我就算满口谎言
[01:21.91]我的声音依然被人忽视
[01:25.06]为了得到关注而撒谎 却依然无人在意
[01:30.61]
[01:32.35]现在我们彼此疏远
[01:34.08]
[01:37.81]曾经让我乐此不疲的事情
[01:40.53]
[01:43.76]现在只是我谋生的工具
[01:48.31]
[01:49.66]我所梦寐以求的事物
[01:54.04]
[01:55.65]总有一天会使我厌烦
[01:58.74]
[01:59.35]真是奇怪
[02:09.66]
[02:10.66]我们会那样在意 最后又那样漠不关心
[02:15.79]
[02:17.16]我年岁渐长 肩上的负担日益沉重
[02:21.93]
[02:22.73]但我可以更加坦然的接受自己的错误
[02:27.76]
[02:28.78]我从未感觉如此幸福 至少 这是我竭尽全力后的结果
[02:34.48]让自己振作精神 将快乐放在首要位置
[02:39.94]
[02:41.28]因为说实话 我只希望我许诺要做到的事
[02:46.14]我能靠我的付出来争取
[02:49.15]而不是恳求他的准许
[02:51.59]
[02:52.21]并非我自己选择
[02:54.51]
[02:56.26]这样受尽折磨
[03:00.24]
[03:01.78]曾经让我乐此不疲的事情
[03:04.60]
[03:07.50]现在只是我谋生的工具
[03:11.18]
[03:13.68]我所梦寐以求的事物
[03:18.69]
[03:19.66]总有一天会使我厌烦
[03:22.42]
[03:23.15]真是奇怪
[03:34.23]
[03:35.00]我们会那样在意 最后又那样漠不关心
[03:39.86]
[03:41.75]但是下周 我希望自己能在某个地方开怀大笑
[03:46.34]要是有人来问我 我保证自己不会有事
[03:51.76]
[03:53.32]我曾有过创伤 曾有过身不由己
[03:58.28]我无法鼓起勇气告诉你 但是现在 我想是时候坦然面对
